summary: "Sherlock" is a British TV show about the famous detective Sherlock Holmes, updated to modern times. It stars Benedict Cumberbatch as Holmes and Martin Freeman as his friend Dr. Watson. The series, created by Steven Moffat and Mark Gatiss, aired from 2010 to 2017 with 13 episodes. It's known for its great writing, acting, and directing. The show won many awards, including Emmys and a Golden Globe. It was very popular in the UK and was sold worldwide. You can watch it on PBS in the U.S. and buy it on DVD or Blu-ray.
title: Sherlock (TV series)
